name: Orbtastic
description:
Orbtastic is a single-player simple 3D casual game, in which players can either complete the levels or roam around in the form of a ball in the open world. The game may seem to have fantasy environments to some people, and there are no player lives due to which you can take as many turns as you want to complete any particular level.

Some of the assets were imported from the Unity asset store and a few were modeled in Blender.
